summary: A teenager unwittingly falls for the American President's daughter, and the pair soon find themselves off on a wild adventure.
cast: Dabney Coleman|Will Friedle|Elisabeth Harnois|Mimi Kuzyk|Wanda Cannon|Jay Thomas|Oliver Becker|David Blacker|Marium Carvell|Paulo Costanzo|Neil Crone|Nicole de Boer|Diane Douglass|Joel Gordon|Howard Jerome|Chantal Kemp|Dan Lett|James Millington|Frank Moore|Dave Nichols|Grant Nickalls|Karl Pruner|Ron Reagan|Adam Greydon Reid|Garry Robbins|Alison Sealy-Smith|Sandi Stahlbrand|Rob Stefaniuk|Scott Wickware|Gordon Michael Woolvett|Matt Birman|Patrick Gallagher|Polly Shannon
title: My Date with the President's Daughter
